PromotionInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Animals are influenced by various effects.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_CHANNELING1_PEDIA
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_SECOND_CHANCE_HELP
[ICON_BULLET]Beast King strengthen animals under his command.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_STIGMATA_PEDIA
[ICON_BULLET]Every Victory increases Empire Culture by 20 + 5 per level of the Bard.
[ICON_BULLET]Sages often retire from the battlefield and focus on developing new arcane knowledge.
[ICON_BULLET]May use [LINK=PROMOTION_SPELLSTAFF][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]the spellstaff[COLOR_REVERT][\LINK] to cast a second spell in each turn.
[ICON_BULLET]Use Spellstaff to restore your arcane energy.
[ICON_BULLET]May sacrifice a unit to gain experience and to replenish their health.
[ICON_BULLET]May unleash the power of Blood Magic to replenish health.
[ICON_BULLET]Gain a fearsome roar and then fiery breath weapon as the mage slowly adopts draconic aspects.
[ICON_BULLET]Psionics are capable of silencing enemy spellcasters.
[ICON_BULLET]While some arcanists rely on raw power, Shadowbenders rely on finesse and subtlety.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_INQUISITOR_HELP
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_MAGIC_RESISTANCE_PEDIA
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_STIGMATA_PEDIA
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_ENRAGED_HELP
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_GREAT_COMMANDER_PEDIA
[ICON_BULLET]Corlindale no longer able to cast Peace.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Hostile units approaching Corlindale is pacified.

PromotionInfo.Civilopedia: Given to most units under [LINK=TRAIT_BARBARIAN]Barbarian[\LINK] leaders.

PromotionInfo.Help: TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_WILLPOWER_HELP
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_POISONED_PEDIA
[ICON_BULLET]Unit can not cast spells or attack enemies until this condition is cured.
[ICON_BULLET]Unit can not cast spells.
[ICON_BULLET]Unit can not use spells and suffers damage until this condition is cured.
[ICON_BULLET]Unit can not move or cast spells until this condition is cured.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_PLAGUE_CARRIER_PEDIA
[ICON_BULLET]Gibbon Goetia can copy other people's body and strength.
